price: 49. Oo kuwaas ku jira Naarta waxay ku odhan  furahayeennada Naarta: Noo barya Rabbigiin hanaga fudaydsho maalin qudha cadaabka.
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ فِي ٱلنَّارِ لِخَزَنَةِ جَهَنَّمَ ٱدۡعُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ يُخَفِّفۡ عَنَّا يَوۡمٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waqāla alladhīna fī al-nāri likhazanati jahannama id'ʿū rabbakum yukhaffif ʿannā yawman mina al-ʿadhābi
